description: {"blocks":[{"key":"egb6","text":"This protocol describes how we maintain murine intestinal organoids and perform the enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) for serotonin (5-HT).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Gut Enterochromaffin Cells are Critical Drivers of Visceral Pain and Anxiety (https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.04.04.486775v1)
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"60e8r","text":"DPBS, no calcium, no magnesium (Thermo Fisher #14190144)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s86v","text":"DPBS, no calcium, no magnesium + 2 mM EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo122","text":"Advanced DMEM/F-12 (Thermo Fisher #12634010)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jtlh","text":"1 M HEPES (Thermo Fisher #15630080)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5akk8","text":"GlutaMAX™ Supplement (Thermo Fisher #35050061)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kg29","text":"Penicillin-Streptomycin (10,000 U/mL) (Thermo Fisher #15140163)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ffiu","text":"Recombinant Murine Noggin (Peprotech #250-38)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv70p","text":"Mouse EGF Recombinant Protein (Thermo Fisher #PMG8041)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ht8h","text":"N-Acetyl-L-cysteine (Millipore-Sigma #A7250-5G)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6m4v9","text":"B-27™ Supplement (50X), serum-free (Thermo Fisher #17504044)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9aem","text":"R-spondin 2 (supernatant from R-spondin expressing HEK293 cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c383h","text":"Corning® Matrigel® Matrix (Corning #356231)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3j2sf","text":"Bovine Serum Albumin (Millipore-Sigma #A9418)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2d0r0","text":"Serotonin ELISA kit (LDN #BA-E-8900)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g8qi","text":"24-well plate (Falcon® 24-Well Plate #38021)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ug8t","text":"Corning™ Falcon™ Cell Strainers 70 µm (Corning #08-771-2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dklnl","text":"Ringer's solution (140 mM NaCl, 5 mM KCl, 2 mM CaCl2, 2 mM MgCl2, 10 mM D-glucose, and 10 mM HEPES-Na [pH 7.4]))","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":51,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":63,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68i23","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es06c","text":"Following four mouse lines were used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au4bo","text":"RC::FL-hM3Dq (Jackson Labs, Strain #026942)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c84sn","text":"Tac1Cre (Jackson Labs, strain #021877)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d19l4","text":"Pet1Flp (gift of Dr. Susan Dymecki)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bl95e","text":"RC::PFTox (gift of Dr. Susan Dymecki)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpojk","text":"Add 5 mL of GlutaMAX, 1 M HEPES, and Penicillin-Streptomycin to 500 mL of Advanced DMEM/F-12 and filter through 0.22 um. This basal media can last up to1 month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f607n","text":"Put an aliquot of matrigel in fridge at 4°C. Put a 24-well plate to a 37°C incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dcj0a","text":"Put desired volume of complete media at 37°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ecesg","text":"Aspirate media from wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qjhi","text":"Add 500 µL cold basal media to a well and let it sit for about 15 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pgs","text":"Pipette up and down to dissolve matrigel, collect organoids, and move to a 15 mL falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2rrg","text":"Add 500 µL cold basal media to a well, collect residual organoids, and move to the same 15 mL falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rb71","text":"Place a 200 µL tip inside a 1000 µL tip and pipette up and down ~25 times to break up organoids","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1c8hm","text":"Add 10 mL cold basal media to the falcon tube and mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7rt66","text":"Centrifuge at 200 g for 3 min at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q0dk","text":"Aspirate the supernatant (be careful not to aspirate the organoid pellet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bqdp1","text":"Add 10 mL cold basal media to the falcon tube and mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1rb25","text":"Centrifuge at 200 g for 3 min at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6ntc","text":"Aspirate the supernatant (be careful not to aspirate the organoid pellet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pivt","text":"Add 200 µL of ice-cold matrigel to the falcon tube and mix the organoids well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ategk","text":"Pipette 50 µL of the matrigel/organoid suspension into the center of each of four wells of a prewarmed 24-well plate to form domes in the center of each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c70bt","text":"Place the lid on the culture plate and quickly turn the plate upside down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6784j","text":"Incubate at 37°C for 10 minutes to set the matrigel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ev9i1","text":"Turn the plate back upside so that you can apply media to wells. Gently add 500 µL complete media to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajngp","text":"Add basal media to surrounding wells to prevent the wells from drying","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ovql","text":"Exchange the media every 3-4 days or whenever the media turns yellow. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f680j","text":"Split again in 6-8 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18n4r","text":"Organoids are grown for 4-6 days","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsdf","text":"Aspirate the supernatant (be careful not to aspirate the organoid pellet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg6ac","text":"Add 500 µL of cold DPBS to a well and let it sit for about 15 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ajfo","text":"Gently pipette up and down ~10 times with P-1000 to remove matrigel (but not to break the organoids up) and move to a 15 mL falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"68gh0","text":"Add 500 µL of cold DPBS to the tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"css5b","text":"Put the tube on ice for 5 min ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b6488","text":"Gently pipette up and down ~10 times with P-1000","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aghnq","text":"Add 10 mL cold DPBS and spin down at 200 g for 3 min at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5i8n3","text":"Aspirate the supernatant as much as possible","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp5s7","text":"Add 1 mL cold DPBS and gently pipette up and down ~10 times with P-1000","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bkm7r","text":"Add 10 mL cold DPBS and spin down at 200 g for 3 min at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2jqhr","text":"Aspirate the supernatant as much as possible","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"djvob","text":"Repeat the step #33-35 twice to completely wash the matrigel out","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qhna","text":"Add 100 µL DPBS + 0.1% BSA and move organoids to an eppendolf tube (it is important to add 0.1% BSA to prevent organoids from sticking to tubes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50bp8","text":"Remove the supernatant and add 100 µL Ringer's (140 mM NaCl, 5 mM KCl, 2 mM CaCl2, 2 mM MgCl2, 10 mM D-glucose, and 10 mM HEPES-Na [pH 7.4])) buffer for ELISA assay (do not lyse the organoids as you are measuring released serotonin).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":80,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":92,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqots","text":"ELISA is performed according to the manufacturer's protocol (https://www.ldn.de/wp-content/uploads/IFU-BA-E-5900R-V15.0_wz.pdf).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":65}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"734DF3A892CC11ED9DE00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ldn.de/wp-content/uploads/IFU-BA-E-5900R-V15.0_wz.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euiko","text":"Organoids were generated from male Tac1-Cre(+/-);Pet1Flp(+/-);RC::FL-hM3Dq(+/-) or Tac1-Cre(+/-);Pet1Flp(+/-);RC::OFTox(+/-) animals (5-8 weeks old).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5epr1","text":"Add 800 µL of B-27, Recombinant Murine Noggin (final conc. 100 ng/mL), Mouse EGF Recombinant Protein (final conc. 500 ng/mL), N-Acetyl-L-cysteine (final conc. 0.5 mM),  and 4 mL of R-spondin 2 to 40 mL of basal media. This complete media can last up to 2 weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":126,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hplo","text":"Euthanize the animal under CO2 and spray belly with 70% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":29,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"53vlo","text":"Filet open the intestine along the mesentery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18c8d","text":"Isolate the whole small intestine and divide the tissue into three pieces. Use the middle piece (jejunum) for organoid generation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73fb","text":"Scrape off the villi using a glass coverslip. Scrape well so that all the villi come off. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a51rv","text":"Cut the intestine into 2-4 mm pieces and move to a 50 mL falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b9lq6","text":"Add 10 mL ice-cold DPBS. Pipette up and down with 10 mL pipettes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehm7o","text":"Wait for a couple of minutes until the tissue settles down and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"346eb","text":"Repeat the step 9-10 until the supernatant becomes clear (usually 4-5 times).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqpnd","text":"Add 30 mL of ice-cold DPBS + 2 mM EDTA and rock the tube at 4°C for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar5r2","text":"Wait for a couple of minutes until the tissue settles down and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6s6n2","text":"Wait for a couple of minutes until the tissue settles down and move the supernatant to falcon tube #1 prepared at step #13.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"39ong","text":"Add 10 mL ice-cold DPBS. Pipette up and down with 10 mL pipettes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3oq4","text":"While waiting, prepare 6x 50 mL falcon tubes and label them No.1-6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aoh8o","text":"Repeat the step 15-16 five times. Note that the supernatant should be put into separated tubes prepared at step #13 (tube #2-6).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47u7l","text":"Place 20 µL of each supernatant fraction on a glass slide and check under a microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"89baj","text":"Identify fractions that contain crypts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ta5b","text":"Combine crypts-containing fractions and filter through a 70 µm strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8022e","text":"Spin down at 900 g for 5 minutes and discard the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj0vo","text":"Resuspend pellet with 10 mL ice-cold basal media and spin down at 900 g for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"75km9","text":"Carefully remove all the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6b6qr","text":"Repeat the step #22 and #23.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7sslg","text":"Resuspend the pellet into 400 µL ice-cold matrigel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49e0s","text":"Pipette 50 µL of the matrigel/organoid suspension into the center of each of four wells of a prewarmed 24-well plate to form domes in the center of each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40o9j","text":"Place the lid on the culture plate and quickly turn the plate upside down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9n4a1","text":"Incubate at 37°C for 10 minutes to set the matrigel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7qmv2","text":"Turn the plate back upside so that you can apply media to wells. Gently add 500 µL complete media to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7099","text":"Add basal media to surrounding wells to prevent the wells from drying.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mouse genetic models to manipulate enterochromaffin cell activity - Murine Organoid ELISA
